text: 3.10 Lom 8.38, 11.33, Epe 1.21, 1 Pi 1.12 Pen God ne anɨgɨl gos nɨgup, ensel okok sek tap kɨles adekab mɨdebal okok sek kɨli nɨgɨnɨgel, God ne bɨ gos tɨpagɨl nɨgup ak mɨdeb. Anɨb ak tek mɨñɨl ñɨn anɨb ak, ne binɨb ne okok kɨlop agek, kɨli ensel tap kɨles anɨb okok kɨlop yomebal. Yomel, ensel tap kɨles anɨb okok kɨli nɨgɨnɨgel, God ne bɨ gos tɨpagɨl nɨgup ak mɨdeb.
